definition: thigh/part of a whole/portion of a sum/(stock) share/strand of a thread/low-level administrative unit, translated as "section" or "department" etc, ranked below 科[ke1]/classifier for long winding things like ropes, rivers etc/classifier for smoke, smells etc: thread, puff, whiff/classifier for bands of people, gangs etc/classifier for sudden forceful actions
east/host (i.e. sitting on east side of guest)/landlord

pinyin: nian2 du4 gu3 dong1 da4 hui4
gu3 dong1 te4 bie2 da4 hui4

sentences.english: All shareholders of the company agree to the deregistration.
sentences.chinese: 公司全体股东同意撤销注册。

sentences.english: In the case of a company higher retained earnings will result in a lower dividend paid out to shareholders.
sentences.chinese: 在如此高的公司将被调低留存收益发放股利给股东。

sentences.english: Part II The relationship between the Corporate Goverance and the protection of the minority shareholders.
sentences.chinese: 第二部分小股东利益保护与公司治理的关系。

sentences.english: The Shareholder shall cause the Company to report such appointment to the original examination and approval authority for the record.
sentences.chinese: 股东应责成公司将该委任报原审批机关备案。

sentences.english: Minority shareholders will also be offered ordinary shares, at 1p.
sentences.chinese: 小股东们也将提供每股1便士的普通股。

sentences.english: Equity swap between shareholders of the listed company and shareholders of Huixin Futures.
sentences.chinese: 上市公司股东与汇鑫期货股东进行股权置换。

sentences.english: Equity swap between shareholders of the listed company and shareholders of Huixin Futures.
sentences.chinese: 上市公司股东与汇鑫期货股东进行股权置换。

sentences.english: Opponents of shareholder capitalism claim that it is unscrupulous.
sentences.chinese: 股东制的反对者们认为该制度是一种寡廉鲜耻的制度。

sentences.english: However, the Department did not receive a hundred Yintai groups the support of the former major shareholder.
sentences.chinese: 不过，银泰系并未得到百大集团原大股东的支持。

sentences.english: The merger is subject to standard regulatory and shareholder approvals.
sentences.chinese: 合并计划尚需得到管制部门和股东们的同意。

sentences.english: Derivative lawsuit for the shareholders stem from the UK-US legal system.
sentences.chinese: 股东派生诉讼起源于英美法系。

sentences.english: This thesis is meanly to focus on the shareholder's information right of a company limited by shares.
sentences.chinese: 本论文旨在探讨股份有限公司下的股东资讯权保障。

sentences.english: The Low-Temp Food Group will be dedicated to creating the best long-term value for our stockholders.
sentences.chinese: 低温群将不断致力于创造股东最高的长期权益。

sentences.english: India and Russia are the second- and third-largest shareholders.
sentences.chinese: 印度和俄罗斯分别成为第二和第三大股东。

sentences.english: The resolution was invalid because the shareholder's meeting was not quorate.
sentences.chinese: 因股东大会不够法定人数，故该决议无效。

sentences.english: Some shareholders were not paying attention to the board's recommendations.
sentences.chinese: 一些股东并没有留意股东会的建议。

definition: to own a controlling number of shares in a company
